name: A Letter For J
description:
A Letter For J is a twine game for the Gay Western Jam.

You are trying to write a letter to your friend/lover/partner, J.

Written by Alix Nyden.

Please let me know if something doesn't work, if there is a point where you can't progress, or even if there is a grammatical error. I tried to account for everything and make sure to test everything, but it is VERY possible that I missed something.

Thank you for checking out my game!
